ni hao
zai jian

qing

zao an

en:
Go to bed!
Time to wake up!
cnInfo:
kuai dian qu shui jiao
qi chuang la!

enInfo: The chinese word-for-word translation is: "Have you eaten already". This is from bad times. When it was not going well there was no food.
cnInfo:
ni che le ma?
中文直译是"你吃了吗"。这是以前环境不好的说法，没有饭吃就过得不好

Ni yao qu nar?
这是交谈时的礼貌的方式。表示有兴趣了解你的去向

Zai jian
wan an
ming tian jian

xie xie
bu yong xie

enInfo: Literally: I have given you so much trouble. Say this when someone helped you and you want to show your appreciation.
cnInfo:
ma fan ni le
比如当你叫别人帮你把猫找回来。当别人把猫找回来的时候，说谢谢还不够，就要说麻烦你了

en: Excuse me, when is dinner ready?
cnInfo:
Qing wen, shen me shi hou chi fan
不像中文，在英文说吃饭的时候要说明吃饭的时期。比如午饭或晚饭

en:
May I ask your family name
My family name is Chen
cnInfo:
qing wen ni gui xin?
wo xing yan yan

en:
Where are you from?
I am from China
cn:
你是哪国人
我是中国人
cnInfo:
ni shi na guo ren?
wo lai zi zhong guo

en:
What is this called?
This is called tea.
cnInfo:
zhe ge jiao shen me?
zhe ge jiao cha.

en: I only speak very few English
cnInfo: wo zhi hui yi dian ying wen

en: Can you say that again more simple please?
cn: 你可以说得更简单一点吗?
cnInfo: ni ke yi shuo de geng jian dan yi dian ma?
qing jiang de man yi dian

wo dong
wo bu dong

en:
how old are you?
I am nine years old
cnInfo:
ni jin nian ji sui?
wo jin nian jiu sui

en:
What do you do? I am a ...
student, businessperson, nurse, engineer
cn: 我是...学生,商人,护士,工程师
cnInfo: wo shi ... xue sheng, shangren, hushi, gongchengshi
